task.title: Test Your Video Measurement Code
task.shortdesc: A simple way to test your Flash video player is to enable debugging and then view the debug output in Flash Professional.

step.cmd: Verify that AppMeasurement debugTracking is enabled in your ActionScript:

stepresult.codeblock: /* Turn on and configure debugging here */ s.debugTracking = true;

step.cmd: Press F2 to display the Output pane.
Each server call appears in the AppMeasurement Debug output similar to the following:

stepresult.codeblock: AppMeasurement Debug: http://democorp.112.2o7.net/b/ss/democorpscdoc/ 0/FAS-3.4.3-AS3/s03319123252294?AQB=1&ndh=1&t=28/6/2011%2013%3A33%3A2%204%20360 &ce=UTF-8&pageName=video%20test&g=file%3A///F%7C/sandbox/Video/video%2520test.swf &cc=USD&events=event1%2C%2C&v1=video&c2=Clip14-tahoe.f4v&v2=Clip14-tahoe.f4v &pe=m_s&pev3=video&s=1680x1050&AQE=1 http://democorp.112.2o7.net/b/ss/democorpscdoc/0/FAS-3.4.3-AS3/s03319123252294?AQB=1 ndh=1 t=28/6/2011 13:33:2 4 360 ce=UTF-8 pageName=video test g=file:///F|/sandbox/Video/video%20test.swf cc=USD events=event1,, v1=video c2=Clip14.f4v v2=Clip14.f4v pe=m_s pev3=video s=1680x1050 AQE=1
stepresult.p: This example server call is from a video start. In the previous example, event1 is selected to track video views. If you are tracking milestones, play through your video and watch for a hit that contains the event you selected for that milestone.

In the previous example, event3 is selected to track time viewed, and
event6 is selected for the milestone.

example.p: If you can't get your project to work, you can create a simple video test project:

ol.li: Create a new ActionScript 3.0 project and then Add the AppMeasurement for Flash Library.
Drag and drop a local video file on your project. Click Next, Next, then Finish to add the video using the default options.

Press F9 to open Actions, and then paste the
into the actions window.
Click Debug > Debug Movie > Debug to run the project. AppMeasurement debug call appear in the Output window (press F2 if you can't see it). Note that this data does not go to any report suite.
